channel.name: Dubai One En AE
channel.title: The Wedding Guest
channel.desc: Action, Drama, Thriller, Mystery 2018 A British Muslim man travels to Pakistan to abduct a young woman on her wedding day, as her family is coercing her into an unwanted marriage. However, their plan unravels when they cross the Pakistani-Indian border. Dev Patel, Nish Nathwani, Radhika Apte, Jim Sarbh, Clara Hall, Harish Kunverji, Sarfaraz, Michael Winterbottom, Michael Winterbottom, Harish Khanna, Vivek Sharma.
